name: 陳儀
objective: This course is specifically designed for overseas Chinese and Hong Kong-Macau students. Through the study of literary works, discussions on contemporary textual issues, and creative literary writing, it aims to develop students' Chinese comprehension, communication, and appreciation skills while deepening their understanding of culture, the world, and their own lives. Additionally, the course incorporates practical applications to enhance students' proficiency in using Chinese in professional settings.

remarks: 1. Course Corresponding Indicators: 4. Quality EducationThe corresponding course content for Indicator 4, "Education for sustainable development and global citizenship," includes teaching topics from Weeks 2-15, which focus on the Chinese literature and philosophy.2. The course topics from Weeks 2 to 10, titled "Literary Reading and Philosophical Discussion," correspond to the "Explanation" stage of the innovative character education 6E teaching method. Through reading comprehension and dialogic discussions, students are encouraged to reflect on behavioral norms.
